title: Godzilla Complete Boxset (Plus bonus material)
description:
This folder contains the official box-set release of Toho Studio's most famous series: Godzilla! These are all the Godzilla movies produced by Toho, from the grand original to 2004's "Godzilla: Final Wars." All these are remastered hi-def (some more so than others, it seems), widescreen, in Japanese with English subtitles. 


Subtitles: 
Subtitle files (*.srt) are included in each individual folder. I've checked each to make sure it's working: all load up automatically in VLC Media Player. If you don't get subtitles, you may need to load them manually, or your file may have gotten corrupted; try downloading it again. However, the srt files open like any text file in Notepad: check that first. They all should be easily readable, ex.: 

1
00:00:29,000 --> 00:00:31,000
Captain, the radio's out!

2
00:00:31,200 --> 00:00:35,500
- It can't be! What wrong?
- A lot of abnormal interference.

Video:
All are widescreen, but some may play back in differing modes. Your media player of choice should have a simple function to switch between aspect ratios. Fiddle with that if the movie doesn't look right, or if you want to try different views. The extremely wide letterbox view isn't always the best
